text: The Houhu Seashore Park () is a park in Jinning Township, Kinmen County, Taiwan. ==History== Due to the long presence of the Republic of China Armed Forces along the shoreline, the beach remains relatively clean all these times. Recently, more facilities have been constructed within the area. ==Activities== The beach is the venue for the once-in-12-years Houhu Sea Chau ancient ritual for the deceased fishermen. The ritual is registered as the intangible cultural assets of the county. ==See also== * List of parks in Taiwan ==References== Category:Parks in Kinmen County
title: Houhu Seashore Park
